text:
--


----- Препратено писмо от tbl_ood@mail.bg -----

Дата: 08.01.2020 в 11:44
Подател: RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu)
Относно: FGSZ Network User Workshop
Получател: tbl_ood@mail.bg 

 

 



Dear Network User Partner! 

FGSZ provides you with the business functions and data traffic needed for gas transmission and capacity trading with its own developed business applications.

We would like to provide you more efficient support in day by day usage of our business applications, in order to get the most out of the RBP, IP and TP – making your daily work much more easier.

 

FGSZ Zrt. is organizing a workshop for those Network Users, who are interested in learning about functions of the business applications mentioned above.

 

Place of workshop: Siófok, Tanácsház street 5., FGSZ building

 

Participation fee: 100 000 Ft/person

 

Date of the workshop will be determined based on the responses received from applicants, but is expected to take place on the 26th of February, 09:00 – 16:00 CET. 

 

On the workshop – following the theoretical part – the course will provide insights into the process of capacity booking, nomination and balancing through computer simulation test scenarios.

 

More details: https://fgsz.hu/en/for-business/network-users/network-users-workshop 

 

In case you are interested, please contact us on e-mail address: rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu>  until 31st January 2020. 

 

 

Sincerely: FGSZ Zrt.

 

 



-------------------------------------
Mail.BG <http://mail.bg> : Безплатен e-mail адрес. Най-добрите характеристики на българския пазар - 30 GB пощенска кутия, 1 GB прикрепен файл, безплатен POP3, мобилна версия и други.
subject: FWD: FGSZ Network User Workshop
